dcterms:description: The R2R dataset was originally created for training instruction-following agents. Each data point was collected by asking a crowd-worker to write a verbal description of a path in an environment. The dataset is split into a training set, a seen validation set, and an unseen validation set.
dcterms:title: Room-to-Room (R2R)

dcterms:creator: P. Anderson

dcterms:description: Matterport3D is a photo-realistic simulator of the visual perception of a person walking in an indoor environment, providing RGB images capturing the 360-degree panoramic view.
dcterms:title: Matterport3D

dcterms:creator: J. Jain
G. Magalhaes
A. Ku
A. Vaswani
E. Ie
J. Baldridge
dcterms:description: R4R is a dataset focused on instruction fidelity in vision-and-language navigation, providing a framework for evaluating how well instructions are followed.
dcterms:title: R4R

dcterms:creator: A. Ku
P. Anderson
R. Patel
E. Ie
J. Baldridge
dcterms:description: RxR is a multilingual vision-and-language navigation dataset that includes dense spatiotemporal grounding, allowing for instruction generation across different languages.
dcterms:title: RxR

dcterms:creator: A. H. Anderson

J. Kowtko

dcterms:description: The HCRC Map Task Corpus is a dataset used for studying human communication and instruction following in a map-based task.
dcterms:title: HCRC Map Task Corpus
